headline: NTT DATA Appoints Seelan Nayagam as Asia Pacific CEO
summary: LONDON, February 10, 2026--NTT DATA, a global leader in AI, digital business and technology services, today announced the appointment of Seelan Nayagam as the new Chief Executive Officer for Asia Pacific at NTT DATA, Inc., effective March 16, 2026, based in Singapore. Nayagam succeeds John Lombard and will report directly to NTT DATA, Inc. President and CEO, Abhijit Dubey.

Nayagam succeeds John Lombard and will report directly to NTT DATA, Inc. President and CEO, Abhijit Dubey.

headline: IBM’s Defense And AI Cybersecurity Moves Versus Current Valuation Picture
summary: IBM (NYSE:IBM) has been selected to support the U.S. Missile Defense Agency's SHIELD program, expanding its role in national defense technology. The company is also integrating external AI-powered threat intelligence into its QRadar SIEM and SOAR cybersecurity platforms. These developments highlight IBM's focus on advanced defense and security solutions that rely on AI and data-informed decision making. For investors watching NYSE:IBM, these updates sit squarely in two of the company’s core...

headline: IBM Introduces Autonomous Storage with New FlashSystem Portfolio Powered by Agentic AI
summary: IBM (NYSE: IBM) today unveiled the next generation of IBM FlashSystem, co-run by agentic AI, ushering in a new era of autonomous storage. By enhancing FlashSystem's existing AI capabilities with agentic AI, IBM is redefining resilience through sustained protection, autonomous threat analysis, and customized recovery recommendations. Clients can now turn storage into an always-on layer of intelligence, enabling reliable and secure storage operations that can reduce the manual effort of storage ma

summary: AI in oncology is poised to revolutionize cancer care through early, accurate detection, and personalized treatment, driven by rising cancer rates.
